mygrad.operation_base.BroadcastableOp¶

class mygrad.operation_base.BroadcastableOp[source]¶

Signals that an Operation’s forward pass can broadcast its tensor arguments.

Methods

__call__(*input_vars) Performs a forward pass, f, of this Operation:
backward(grad, *, graph, **kwargs) Back-propagates the gradient through all of the operation’s inputs.
backward_var(grad, index, **kwargs) Given grad = d(out)/d(f), computes d(out)/d(var), and passes this result to var.backward(), where var is the tensor-argument at position index.
__init__($self, /, *args, **kwargs)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Methods

backward(grad, *, graph, **kwargs) Back-propagates the gradient through all of the operation’s inputs.
backward_var(grad, index, **kwargs) Given grad = d(out)/d(f), computes d(out)/d(var), and passes this result to var.backward(), where var is the tensor-argument at position index.

Attributes

scalar_only
